titleStmt.title: Jesus and the resurrection justified by witnesses in heaven and in earth in two parts : the first shewing that Jesus is the Son of God, the second that in him we have eternall life / by Symon Patrick ...
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

titleStmt.title: Jesus and the resurrection justified by witnesses in heaven and in earth in two parts : the first shewing that Jesus is the Son of God, the second that in him we have eternall life / by Symon Patrick ...
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

biblFull.extent: 1385 p. in various pagings, [2] leaves of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Each part has special t.p. reading: The witnesses to Christianity, or, The certainity of our faith and hope.
Errata: p. [14] (1st grouping) and p. [43] (2nd grouping)
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
